values.name: Night
values.description: What night the player is currently on.

values.name: Star 1
values.description: The first star, obtained for beating Night 5.

values.name: Star 2
values.description: The second star, obtained for beating Nightmare.

values.name: Star 3
values.description: The third star, obtained for getting the good ending.

values.name: Star 4
values.description: The fourth star, obtained for beating Nightmare Aggressive.

values.name: Balloons
values.description: Whether or not you got the rainbow balloon in BB's Air Adventure.

values.description: Whether or not you got the cake in Mangle's Quest.
